articles.title: Cummins chooses between Sachin, Kohli. Khawaja ranks Ganguly, Dravid, Laxman - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australian pacer Pat Cummins was left stumped when he was asked to choose between Sachin Tendulkar and Virat Kohli. Meanwhile, batter Usman Khawaja was asked to rank Tendulkar, Sourav Ganguly, Rahul Dravid and VVS Laxman. | Cricket
